casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timothy BLACKWELL. No. 490PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 3, 2007. Patricia A. Duffy, Robert C. Montgomery, Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney Generals, *802Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC. Marilyz G. Ozer, Chapel Hill, for Black-well.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of January 2007 by Defendant to Stay Issuance of Mandate and to Withdraw the Court's Slip Opinion:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of January 2007."
